Question: Shenzhen Smartnewo Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Smartnewo Technology Co., Ltd.

Tire Inflator, Air Pump, Ball Pump, Air Duster

- Export-oriented enterprise specializing in electric inflatable pumps
- Products include inflatable pumps, ball pumps, air pumps, blowers
- Offers professional pneumatic design solutions and OEM/ODM services
- Industry-leading supply chain system, complete industrial chain from pneumatic solutions to assembly
- 10,000 square meters factory space, 250+ employees, 30-person R&D team, 15-person quality team
- Products equipped with CE, ROHS, FCC, PSE, etc.
- ISO9001 and BSCI certification
- R&D team of 20 people, 5% annual income on research and development
- Obtained 14 national invention patents and 29 utility model patents
- Established long-term cooperation with major brands and supermarkets
- Exhibited at 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, featuring innovative pneumatic products
